summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of agreements with the United States Department of Justice and the United States Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Investigation; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1996 Budgets of the Police Department, Health Department, and Department of Housing and Human Services for the continuation of Weed and Seed Programs; ratifying and confirming prior acts; making an appropriation therefor and extending a position; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
